title: 有什么插件可以锁定单个世界不能放置挖掘方块
author: wykwey
txt_content: 有什么插件可以锁定单个世界不能放置挖掘方块

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
[安全][UD]NotBuild —— 设置指定的或所有人不能破坏某个世界[全版本]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-580585-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

replies.author: csyd
replies.txt_content:
Skript插件写一个sk脚本
on break:
        player is in "world"
        player doesn't have permission "admin.break":
                cancel event
on place:
        player is in "world"
        player doesn't have permission "admin.break":
                cancel event复制代码
